entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cassiar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -28.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
